levels.description: After deployment, gains ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; Attacks Silence the target for <@ba.vup>{attack@silence}</> seconds and cause them to take <@ba.vup>{attack@texas2_s_1[dot].dot_damage}</> Arts damage per second during that duration
